app.name: Indlela
app.tagline: Tsela e e Yang go Tirelo e e Siameng

common.error: Go na le sengwe se se sa tsamayang sentle
common.offline_message: Dikarolo dingwe di ka nna tsa bo di na le mellwane
common.no_results: Ga go na dipholo tse di fitlhetsweng

auth.tagline: Golagana le bafani ba ditirelo ba ba ikanyegang
auth.footer_text: Ka go tswelela, o dumela Melao ya Tirelo ya rona
auth.phone_hint: Re tla go romelela khoutu ya netefatso
auth.otp_subtitle: Re romeletse khoutu ya dinomoro di le 6 go {phone}
auth.otp_placeholder: Tsenya khoutu ya dinomoro di le 6
auth.otp_help_text: Ga o a amogela khoutu? Leba di-SMS tsa gago kgotsa kopa e ntšhwa.
auth.logout_message: A o tlhomamisegile gore o batla go tswa mo akhaontong ya gago?

home.no_providers_message: Ga re a bona bafani mo lefelong la gago. Leka go atolosa patlo ya gago.
home.ai_assistant_title: O tlhoka thuso go bona tirelo?
home.ai_assistant_message: Mothusi wa rona wa AI a ka go thusa go bona mofani wa tirelo o o siameng.

booking.title: Pukiso
booking.cancel_confirm: A o tlhomamisegile gore o batla go khansela pukiso e?

empty.title: Ga go na Dipukiso Ga Jaana
empty.message: Hisetori ya dipukiso tsa gago e tla bonala fano
empty.upcoming_title: Ga go na Dipukiso Tse di Tlang
empty.upcoming_message: Ga o na dipukiso tse di beeletsweng. Batla ditirelo go buka mofani.
empty.past_title: Ga go na Dipukiso Tse di Fetileng
empty.past_message: Dipukiso tsa gago tse di feditseng le tse di khanseditsweng di tla bonala fano.

review.title: Tekanyetsa Maitemogelo a Gago
review.how_was_service: Tirelo e ne e le jang?
review.comment_placeholder: Bolelela ba bangwe ka maitemogelo a gago...
review.thank_you: Re a leboga ka dikakanyo tsa gago!

settings.title: Ditlhophiso
settings.name: Leina
settings.provider_description: Laola ditirelo tsa gago le dituelo tsa gago

errors.network: Phoso ya neteweke. Tsweetswee leka kgolagano ya gago.
errors.server: Phoso ya sefera. Tsweetswee leka gape moragonyana.
errors.invalid_phone: Tsweetswee tsenya nomoro ya mogala ya Aforikaborwa e e amogelwang
errors.invalid_otp: Khoutu ya netefatso e e fosagetseng. Tsweetswee leka gape.
errors.otp_expired: Khoutu ya netefatso e fedile. Tsweetswee kopa e ntšhwa.
errors.rate_limited: Maitekelo a mantsi thata. Tsweetswee emela metsotso e se kae.
errors.forbidden: Ga o na tetla ya go dira se
errors.booking_failed: Go buka go paletse. Tsweetswee leka gape.
errors.location_denied: Phitlhelelo ya lefelo e gannwe. Tsweetswee letla ditirelo tsa lefelo.

validation.phone_format: Tsweetswee tsenya nomoro ya mogala e e siameng
validation.min_length: E tshwanetse go nna bonyennyane ditlhaka di le {min}
validation.max_length: E tshwanetse go nna bogolo ditlhaka di le {max}
